title: Persuasive
description: convince, intimidate, empathize, advise, fascinate, sway

data.desc:
By choice or by necessity, you wear your solitude like a coat of iron.
Wherever you go, none will follow.

The things you cannot hide make most suspicious.
Your beliefs may align, but it's rare that others can see it.

Welcome at the pub, eyed at the courts.
As foolish or foolhardy as any, and every bit as compelling.

An open ear, a rousing song, a sense of purpose that makes most look twice.
Wanted or not, someone is always following in your footsteps.

A few words can unbar a kingdom. They drip across your tongue.
You are enthralling to speak to, or terrifying.
